response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, as it represents years of expertise and innovation. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am extending this opportunity to you with an offer of $9,500. This price reflects the high regard I have for you as a potential buyer and my desire to ensure that you receive a fair deal. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations, so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 9500}
